ygData.subject: Re: Bardic Hot Buttons
ygData.msgSnippet: * SNIP * This is a pretty good list, however, we *just* sent a message to GZ with much of this on it.  Let s wait a bit for some sort of a response before
ygData.messageBody:
* SNIP *

This is a pretty good list, however, we *just* sent a message to GZ with
much of this on it. Let's wait a bit for some sort of a response before
squeaking again ;)

Talies the Wanderer

* SNIP *

I agree, this is to include in a letter which contains some other constructive (
I hope ) things, and will be to Brad. I think GZ needs more specifics than this
letter will include. The goal is to raise the general level of awareness of our
class to the team in general. We've all noticed that warriors, rogues, and
rangers get alot of tinkering. My guess...large player base, large amount of
feedback (or in the rogue's case, very broken and embarrassing). So, since
we're such a small group I'm hoping to do a little PR with the big guy and have
him and his team think on us a bit.

Anyone out there have a list of the songs that still aren't implemented? Are
there any?

Golias, Solusek Ro
